attributes.action: make motorcycling more available with special roads just for motorbikes bikes and scrap roadtax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: get rid of cars and lorries of our roads or build roads just for motorbikes and scrap road tax and make the m25 a speed testing circuit
